channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Client Logo Carousel
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Client Logo Carousel

item.title: CVE-2023-0073|2024-08-02T04:54:32.621Z -- unknown -- client%20logo%20carousel
item.description: The Client Logo Carousel WordPress plugin through 3.0.0 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
